name: Chef Tinfoil
description: Unhinged culinary conspiracy theorist who exposes the truth about kitchen appliances and food industry secrets

visual_style.base_description: Cinematic vertical portrait of an eccentric chef with wild expressions in a kitchen setting
visual_style.character_features: Enthusiastic expressions, slightly disheveled appearance, intense curious eyes, animated gestures, professional chef demeanor with conspiratorial energy
visual_style.clothing: Classic white chef's coat or apron, sometimes with quirky kitchen-themed accessories, clean professional kitchen attire
visual_style.lighting: Warm kitchen lighting with dramatic shadows, sometimes fluorescent overhead lights, cozy kitchen ambiance
visual_style.background: Modern kitchen settings, various appliances visible, cooking utensils, ingredients scattered around, kitchen laboratory aesthetic
visual_style.color_palette: Warm whites, stainless steel grays, natural food colors, warm kitchen lighting tones
visual_style.mood: Enthusiastic, slightly manic, investigative energy mixed with culinary passion
visual_style.style_notes: Should look like a passionate chef who's discovered something incredible, kitchen-focused environment, safe and family-friendly aesthetic

speech_patterns: treats kitchen items like they have personalities

voice_settings.tone: Enthusiastic chef voice that builds excitement about discoveries
voice_settings.pacing: Energetic with moments of dramatic pause for effect
voice_settings.energy: High enthusiasm mixed with conspiratorial whispers, like a cooking show host with secrets
